forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind 15 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk approaches in Downtown San Francisco, the air is characterized by a refreshing clarity, with only a whisper of the marine layer lingering, typical of this remarkable city. The temperature settles gently around 52 degrees under a canopy of mostly clear skies. A brisk west wind dances through the streets, whipping its way at speeds that flirt with 22 miles per hour, adding a vibrant energy to the evening ambiance. The sunset casts long shadows on the eclectic architecture, while the silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge emerges in the distance, framed beautifully against the fading light.

Tomorrow promises a sunny reprieve, with the day unfolding under a bright blue sky and a high of 62 degrees, nudging down to the comfortable embrace of 60 by afternoon. As you contemplate your evening plans, consider how best to dress for this refreshing weather; perhaps a light layering will offer the comfort needed to enjoy a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or to savor a quiet moment at a local café, where you can sip coffee while watching the world drift by. With clear skies reaching to the horizon, exploring the vibrant streets or engaging with friends outdoors could provide the perfect backdrop to unwind on this lovely summer evening.
